press_slider.description: Press the slider down to lower the bread into the slots.

slide_up_slider.description: Slide the slider up to lift the cooked bread out of the slots.

wipe_down_slider.description: Wipe the slider to remove any dust or crumbs.

clean_slider.description: Clean the slider to make sure it functions properly.

clean_slot_interior.description: Clean the inside of the slot to get rid of leftover crumbs.

slide_in_bread.description: Slide in the bread into the slots for toasting.

slide_out_toast.description: Slide out the toast from the slot after it's done.

clean_slot.description: Clean the slot to get rid of any crumbs or debris.

clean_toaster_exterior.description: Clean the exterior of the toaster body to remove dust or stains.

clean_toaster_body.description: Clean the toaster body to keep it shiny and new.

clean_whole_toaster.description: Clean the entire toaster including the slider, slot, and body.

toast_bread.description: Toast the bread starting from sliding in the bread, pressing the slider down, and sliding out the toast.
